title: Save up to $224 with Coupon on Pelican Hard Cases
description: For today only, B&H Photo has on sale a slew of Pelican Hard cases. There is something here for everyone. This sale is for today only (Eastern standard time). You have to add the case to the shopping cart to get the coupon automatically applied. The post Save up to $224 with Coupon on Pelican Hard Cases appeared first on Canon Rumors.
author: Richard

html:
For today only, B&H Photo has on sale a slew of Pelican Hard cases. There is something here for everyone. This sale is for today only (Eastern standard time). You have to add the case to the shopping cart to get the coupon automatically applied.

  • Pelican 1535Air Wheeled Carry-On Hard Case with TrekPak Divider Insert (Black, 27L) $279.95 (Save $143)
  • Pelican 1615AirWF Wheeled Hard Case with Foam Insert (Black) $279.95 (Save $126)
  • Pelican 1535AirWF Wheeled Carry-On Hard Case with Foam Insert (Black) $169.95 (Save $128)
  • Pelican 1615AirTP Wheeled Hard Case with TrekPak Divider Insert System (Black) $313.95 (Save $224)
  • Pelican 1535AirWD Wheeled Carry-On Hard Case with Padded Divider Insert (Black) $249.95 (Save $140)
  • Pelican 1637AirWF Wheeled Hard Case with Foam Insert (Black) $299.95 (Save $161)
  • Pelican 1510SC Studio Case with Lid Organizer and Yellow Divider Set (Black) $199.95 (Save $163)
  • Pelican 1615AirWD Wheeled Hard Case with Divider Insert (Black) $379.95 (Save $151)
  • Pelican 1510 NF Carry-On Case with Foam Inserts, Lid Organizer and Divider Kit $279.95 (Save $88)
  • Pelican Vault 200 Case with Lid Foam and Dividers (Gray, 6.5L) $59.95 (Save $40)
  • Pelican Vault V300 Case with Padded Dividers (Gray, 18.7L) $69.95 (Save $50)
  • Pelican Vault V525WD Wheeled Case with Padded Dividers (Gray, 25L) $129.95 (Save $60)
  • Pelican Vault V525 Wheeled Case with Padded Dividers (Black, 25L) $129.95 (Save $60)
  • Pelican 1650 Case with Foam (Black) $229.95 (Save $149)
  • Pelican Carry-On Case with Trekpak Divider System (Black, Special 50th Anniversary Edition) $229.95 (Save $120)
  • Pelican 1510TP Carry-On Case with Trekpak Divider System (Black) $230.95 (Save $100)
  • Pelican 1510TPF Carry-On Case with Trekpak Divider System and Foam (Black) $169.95 (Save $133)
  • Pelican 1535TRVL Wheeled Carry-On Air Case with Lid Organizer and Packing Cubes (Indigo) $279.95 (Save $110)
  • Pelican 1120 Case with Foam (Black) $29.95 (Save $20)
  • Pelican 1200 Case without Foam (Desert Tan) $39.95 (Save $25)
  • Pelican 1400 Case with Foam (Black) $73.95 (Save $46)
  • Pelican 1450 Case with Foam (Black) $99.95 (Save $63)
  • Pelican 1490 Attache/Computer Case with Foam (Black) $139.95 (Save $72)
  • Pelican 1500 Case with Foam (Black) $109.95 (Save $80)
  • Pelican 1520 Case with Foam (Black) $109.95 (Save $85)
  • Pelican 1550 Case with Foam (Black) $99.95 (Save $117)
  • Pelican iM2975 Storm Trak Case with Foam (Black) $219.95 (Save $186)
  • Pelican 1535AirTPF Wheeled Carry-On Hard Case with Hybrid TrekPak & Foam Insert (Black) $249.95 (Save $129)
  • Pelican iM2075 Storm Case (Coyote, 8.5L) $49.95 (Save $22)
  • Pelican 0340 Cube Case without Foam (Black) $199.95 (Save $201)
  • Pelican 1470 Computer Case with Foam (Black) $99.95 (Save $73)
